trends: There have been 3 other sightings in La Grange
There were no other sightings in La Grange on or around May 7th 1995
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a clear day and i was getting off the expressway (I-71 Northbound)as i got to the end of the exit ramp i saw a craft in the sky it was to the right of the expressway i was shocked at what i saw i new what it was as soon as i saw it I'm pretty good at identifying aircraft as I'm a private pilot the craft was at a altitude of around 800 feet above ground level it was not moving at all the craft was all silver like shinny metal it was around 70 feet wide it was kind of disk shaped it was straight across at top and sloped down at like a 45 degrees on both sides then straight down then back in at a 45 degree i was so shocked i couldn't even speak i remember i looked at it for around 30 seconds and i looked away and i thought to myself there is no way i just saw that the craft was around a mile away but i got a good look at it and i looked back and it was still there i looked at it for around 20 seconds more and then it flew off at a amazing speed in the blink of your eye it was gone i could barely tell what direction it went it it looked like it went southwest i did not here any sound from it i would say before i saw this i thought aliens might be real with so many stories out there but i would say i found it hard to believe i guess its just something you have got to see with your own eyes to believe but as soon as i saw that craft i new we are not alone and there are things we know nothing about i will never forget it and i hope i see something like it again
